item.description:
Dear Conservatives Friends:

Please join us in support of a champion of Faith, Family & Freedom for U.S. Congress, Earl Henry Sholley. Earl will again take on Barney Frank in District 4. There are several ways to accommodate our time and resources scheduled for Thursday, Nov. 19 in the Greater Springfield area. Please see event options here:

Meet the candidate in a casual atmosphere, Nov. 19, 3:00-5:30 p.m. at the American Legion, 83 Park St., West Springfield. Only a $25.00 campaign donation. Light snacks, refreshments, and cash bar.

Meet the candidate in a formal, dining atmosphere, Nov. 19, 5:30-8:30 p.m. at the Monte Carlo Restaurant, 1020 Memorial Ave. West Springfield. Donation of $100 for formal dinner portion (starts at 6:30), or $150.00 for dinner and lounge social with the candidate (starts at 5:30). Choice of three entrees (Chicken, Scrod, Veal) for dinner.

Please RSVP by Nov. 12 with checks payable to Sholley for Congress. Mail to Shirley Nomakeo, 72 Old Jarvis Ave., Holyoke, MA 01040. If you have any questions, simply reply to this e-mail.

Click web links here to meet Earl Henry Sholley:

http://www.youtube.co....

http://sholleyforcong....

- end msg -
item.name: Push Back With Earl Henry Sholley
